name: Lancet-2
trait: Restores the HP of allies and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

talent.name: Support Spray
talent.desc: Immediately restores the HP of all allies by 200 after deployment

talent.name: Support Spray
talent.desc: Immediately restores the HP of all allies by 260 after deployment

talent.name: Support Spray

base skill.desc: When this Operator is assigned to a Power Plant, increases the drone recovery rate by +10%

When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores +0.65 Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
